title: Vaccine using microneedle patch with RSV virus, immune-stimulating compound is effective against RSV

title_detail.value: Vaccine using microneedle patch with RSV virus, immune-stimulating compound is effective against RSV

summary: Skin vaccination using a microneedle patch that contains the inactivated respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) and a compound that stimulates immune responses to the virus has been found to enhance protection against this serious disease and reduce inflammation in the body after exposure to the virus, according to a new study.
